post.body: As soon as I finish the install I'm working on, I'll upload your cooking header (I don't think I've done that yet)
:( I don't know the whole story but I'm sorry. :(
Thanks, Jyl -- You TOO!!!!
I saw that post. HILARIOUS! And, way to go on being willing to help your wife out in that dept. too
I'm working on those last corrections. :)
Private boat? I'm jealous! I'm stuck at home with "The Incredibles" and my 7 year old date.
Thanks -- so do you. :)
I sent you a dm with the link
Are you busy with New Years plans????? If not, can you take a quick look @ the test blog? Still have to edit the girl.
We're in the South and we eat them.
You have a PM!
Praise God -- I'm so excited about this latest news
By the way, I need to finish a quick project and then I'll upload the changes to your look. I'll email when its all ready.
I'm getting ready to finish the header. :)
Thanks for asking -- yeah, it's all fine. I was just having a bad morning. Chocolate made it much better. :)
lol -- nope!!! Don't worry. :) I was just momentarily sad and ready to be home. I've had some chocolate so it's all good!!
Evening, all!
Good morning! Latest post: "No, Honey - We Don't Tickle Strangers." http://followinginmyshoes.blogspot.com
Alright -- finally beat my nephew at his stupid game .. . that means i get to be online the rest of the evening!
Sigh -- this is the 1st New Years I won't have spent with my husband in 5 years!
